item.title: Zelda Twilight Princess Maps
item.description: Maps are good. Here are some shitty maps of most of Zelda: Twilight Princess I used to try and 100% it Areas Temples….but the Compass made creating my own maps pointless sooo…..

item.title: Warhammer Vermintide2 Maps
item.description: Maps are good. Here are some shitty maps of levels from Warhammer Vermintide 2. Taals Horn Keep Righteous Stand Nurgles Buboes Burplespue Halescourge Athel Yenlui Into The Nest Festering Ground Blood In The Darkness Castle Drachenfels Horn Of Magnus

item.title: Other Game Maps
item.description: Maps are good. Here are some shitty maps from various games that don’t warrent their own page. Astral Chain Dark Souls 3 FTL Grim Dawn Heat Signature Left 4 Dead 2 Mario Odyssey Monaco Pokemon Emerald Sekiro Skyward Sword

item.title: Dark Souls Maps
item.description: Maps are good. Here’s some shitty maps of areas from Dark Souls. Undead Asylum Firelink Shrine Upper Undead Burg Undead Church The Depths New Londo Duke’s Archives!Dukes Archives Map 1](images/dark_souls_maps/Dukes_Archives1_Fullsize.jpg)
